summary: Comprehensive testing of Category CRUD, User Management, and Role Management features. Backend APIs working well (93.9% success rate). Frontend role-based sidebar working correctly, but missing route-level permission guards.

minor_bugs.issue: JS delivery test for allowed domains failed - may be related to test data setup
minor_bugs.impact: Low - affects one edge case in JS delivery testing

critical_bugs.issue: Users can access restricted pages (Settings, Users) via direct URL even without menu permissions
critical_bugs.details: Need to add permission-based route guards in PrivateRoute component

passed_tests: Admin login with all 4 menu items (Dashboard, Projects, Settings, Users)
Regular user login with only 2 menu items (Dashboard, Projects)
Category CRUD: Create, update, delete unused categories
Category delete protection for in-use categories
Settings page navigation and category management
User Management page with Users and Roles tabs
Role management: Create, update, delete roles with permissions
Backend APIs: Menu system endpoint (100% success)
action_item_for_main_agent: Add route-level permission guards in App.js. Create a PermissionRoute component that checks user.permissions before allowing access to Settings (/settings) and User Management (/users) pages. Regular users should be redirected to /dashboard if they try to access restricted routes directly.
